code: import React from"react";import{Pie}from"react-chartjs-2";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EVTypeChart=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const evTypes=data.reduce((acc,curr)=>{const type=curr["Electric Vehicle Type"];acc[type]=(acc[type]||0)+1;return acc;},{});const chartData={labels:Object.keys(evTypes),datasets:[{label:"Electric Vehicle Types",data:Object.values(evTypes),backgroundColor:["#36A2EB","#FF6384","#FFCE56"]}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Electric Vehicle Types"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:chartData})]});};export default EVTypeChart;
